name: Zombie With A Shotgun Teaser
description:
Zombies, am I right? They never get old (except old zombies).

Zombie With A Shotgun is a new twist on an old trope where the protagonist has caught the same virus as the rest of the undead, but something is different. Building on the popular webseries, comics and recent full-length movie, Zombie With A Shotgun is a video game that puts the player in the shoes of Aaron, the half-zombie, half-man. Escape the goons trying to catch you for the special genes you're carrying, and why not pet some rabbits along the way?

A short proof-of-concept has been developed and we would love your feedback!

If you feel like checking out our Indiegogo: https://igg.me/at/ZWASVIDEOGAME

Thanks!

Twitter: @KittensRoaring and @ZOMBIEWASHOTGUN
